amendment.description: An amendment numbered 75 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude the Big Cypress National Reserve.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude the Big Cypress National Reserve.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A050) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 215 (Roll no. 63).
